6.7.6 Miscellaneous OLE-SERVER module classes and functions

OLE-util-started-by-OLE?

Function

Signature

OLE-util-started-by-OLE? () => started-by-ole?

Arguments

None.

Values

started-by-ole?
An instance of <boolean>.

Library

OLE-Server

Module

OLE-Server

Description

Returns #t if the program was initiated by OLE; #f if running by itself. Only relevant to a local server, not an in-process server.

OLE, COM, ActiveX and DBMS Reference - 31 MAR 2000
